metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) at what intervals local courts, countrywide, receive grants from the Government; and

questions.minister: Minister of Small and Medium Enterprise Development when the Government will empower marketeers in Chitambo District with the marketeer booster loans.
questions.question_text: NOTICE OF MOTION Ms Halwiindi Introduce Tree Planting Week: That, in order to mitigate the effects of Climate Change, this House urges the Government to introduce an annual tree planting week.
